__e: You thought I was boring and a borderline alcoholic, and because you don't know me, not the real me anyway, you don't want to kiss me, and you absolutely want me to run for the hills.
I told them that you were an alcoholic... and that I would take you home... and that we would never go in there ever again.
I know, but I finally realized that once an alcoholic, always an alcoholic, and to live one's entire life without having a scotch or two is really... not a life worth living.
